overview:
Antony Ivanov is product and marketing guy with more than 5 years IT project management experience. He is passionate about big ideas that may sound a bit crazy. Currently he is the Regional Manager of Bulgarian’s brunch of Media Engine â€“ US company working in the field of mobile web. Prior to that, he managed the Internet business of Nova TV Bulgaria for 2 years.

Antony has experience leading internationals teams and knows how to manage a successful product and market it. He has extensive experience with SEO and CPM, CPC and CPA networks. His others areas of interest include web design and Ruby on Rails.
